item.content:encoded:
Birthday Balloons with Custom Name & Age Option Card

Review Birthday Balloons with Custom Name & Age Option Card – Birthday Cards Birthday Balloons with Custom Name & Age Option Card quality over price Birthday Balloons with Custom Name & Age Option Card Try to read more firstThis delightful birthday greeting card features a vibrant and playful design that is sure to bring joy to anyone’s special day. The front of the card showcases three colorful balloons in red, green, and blue, each adding a touch of whimsy to the overall look. A festive bunting banner stretches across the top corner, setting a celebratory tone. The background is sprinkled with a few stars and several red hearts, which surround the cheerful “Happy Birthday” message. The card is artistically divided by brush strokes into two color blocks, both in a rich purple hue, with a white brush stroke crossing the center portion.

What makes this card truly special is the customizable text area, where you can personalize it with an age or name by clicking “Personalize this template.” If desired, the age and name can be removed completely, allowing you to tailor the card to suit any milestone or individual, making it a versatile choice for any birthday celebration.

Inside the card, you’ll find a heartfelt message that reads: “Wishing you a day filled with everything that makes you happy.” The same lovely purple color is used on the inside and back of the card, creating a cohesive and charming design. This thoughtful message, combined with the card’s delightful graphics and personalization options, makes it a memorable keepsake for someone’s special day. Price:$4.17
